Item 5.07 - Submission of Matters to a V.content: The Annual Meeting of Shareholders of Apple Inc. was held on February 23, 2021. At the Annual Meeting, Apple’s shareholders voted on the following five proposals and cast their votes as described below.

subsections.Proposal 2: Ratification of Independent:
A management proposal to ratify the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as Apple’s independent registered public accounting firm for 2021 was approved.

For: 13,148,792,411
Against: 153,657,833
Abstained: 44,978,297
subsections.Proposal 3: Advisory Vote to Approve Exe:
An advisory resolution to approve executive compensation was approved.

For: 9,254,006,580
Against: 499,113,309
Abstained: 57,604,194
Broker Non-Vote: 3,536,704,458
subsections.Proposal 4: Shareholder Proposal on Prox:
A shareholder proposal entitled “Shareholder Proxy Access Amendments” was not approved.

For: 3,320,476,647
Against: 6,394,730,252
Abstained: 95,517,184
Broker Non-Vote: 3,536,704,458
subsections.Proposal 5: Shareholder Proposal to Impr:
A shareholder proposal entitled “Shareholder Proposal to Improve Executive Compensation Program” was not approved.

For: 539,512,386
Against: 9,141,454,196
Abstained: 129,757,501
Broker Non-Vote: 3,536,704,458
